text: I have been attending Heritage Baptist for a year now. This is a mission focused and biblically grounded church. The Pastor is a friendly, humourous and profound teacher. Many of the members faithfully attends the Wednesday night prayer meeting at 123 Lor 1 Toa Payoh. The men's fellowship is held once every month on Saturday and the attendance is good. The best part is that the church also runs a Bible Theology School twice a week on weekday night.
A warm church were the members are friendly and helpful, like a big family. The Word of God is faithfully preached from the King James bible . A missions minded church.
Friendly and welcoming. Thankful to find a church with preaching based on the Word of God
It is a Bible-believing church  where you can learn about the word of God. This Church practices their beliefs upon biblically sound doctrines.
A very good church with alot of good people they are very help full and caring
